San Mao was a celebrated Chinese writer. Her articles are always about the stories of her experiences in foreign countries.

America and other countries to study. Six years later, she married Jose and lived in the Sahara desert. She wrote her first article The stories of the Sahara at the age of thirty- three.        San Mao wrote a lot of articles in her life. These articles are still popular today.

Most of her works are popular among readers.

San Mao is one of the most famous writers in China, she born in Chong Qing on March 26 1943. At her age of 5, she moved to Tai wan with her parents. She was very smart and studied so hard that she went to many countries to study in 1967. When she was 30 years old, she married with Jese and lived in the Sahara which was hot, and dry. In 1976, she finished her first book—the stories of the Sahara. In 1981, she came back to the Tai wan and became a teacher in a university. Unluckily, she died in 1991. she wrote lots of books in her life. The books all are popular among the readers.

San Mao had much work and she was popular with readers.

San Mao is one of the most famous writers in China. She born in Chong Qing on March 26 1943. At her age of 5, she moved to Tai wan with her parents. San Mao was a celebrated writer in China. She wrote many stories about her experiences in different places, and they are popular both at home and abroad. 
San Mao was born on March 26th in 1943 in ChongQing. When she was 5 years old, her family moved to Taiiwai. She went to Spain for furyher education at the age of 24. After that, she went to Germany, the US and many other countries. In 1973, San Mao married Jose and decided to live in the Sahara. 3 years later, her first work named The Stories of the Sahara came out. She went back to Taiiwai and worked as a university teacher in 1981. 
This beautiful woman passed away on January 4th in 1991. Though she died young, she left many works and readers deeply love them.

A famous writer
San Mao was a famous woman who worked as a writer. She was born on March 16th, 1943 in Chongqing. 
In 1848, she move to Taiwan with her parents. At the age of 24, she went to study in Spain. Then, she kept on studying in Germany, the USA and some other countries. In 1973, she got married to Jose and settled in Sahara. He first work called The Stories of the Sahara began to be sold in 1976. She didn't come back to Taiwan until 1981. She worked as a teacher at a university. Sadly, she passed away on January 4th, 1991. She wrote quantities of good articles during her life. As a result, her stories are still read and loved by lots of people today.

Dear Alice,
  I'm sorry to hear that you have trouble getting on with your parents.
  Here is my advice to solve the problem.
  First, more talking with your parents in free time. And try to know and respect them. Second, be polite with your parents. It is impolite of you to shout at them. When you get angry, you must keep calm. Third, you can do some house work such as clean the floor and wash the dishes after dinner. Don't let your parents to tired. Finally, study hard and don't let they are worried about you. In addition, you can make a surprise to them. What's more, you much be patient with them.
  I think my advice is helpful for you. And I hope you have a close relationship with your parents. Go for it!

The worker shouted: " Hey! Don't stand on that pedal for a long time ! You'll fall off it ! " Mr Field didn't hear that. He was completely shocked by his painting.
"Do you really think your painting is good enough? " said the worker. Mr Field finally answered:"Yeah, I can watch this all day. " "But I don't think so," the worker replied, "You're too proud of your ability, Mr Field. I don't think that being self-satisfied is a good way to improve your painting skill. Besides, it's not right to stand on the pedal for too long. It'll spend us a long time fixing it!"
Eventually. Mr Field realized his mistake and said sorry to the worker. He would never do this again.

San Mao was a celebrated woman writer in China. She wrote many books in her life. Most of her works were written to describe her travelling stories in different places. 
San Mao was born in Chongqing on 26th March, 1943. In 1948, she moved to Taiwan with her parents. She went to Spain for further study in 1967. And later she went to Germany, America and other country to study. She lived in Sahara with her husband Jose after they married. 
She published her first work The stories of Sahara in 1976. A few years later, in 1981, she returned to Taiwan to teach. She died on 4th January, 1991.
Although she died, her works were still popular with readers.

San Mao is a famous female writer in china. She was born on March 26th, 1943 in Chong Qing. 
In 1948, she moved to TaiWan with her parents. Then she went to Spain for her study in 1967, and she went to Germany and America for further study. In 1973 she got marry with Jose and lived in the Sahara for a long time. In 1976, she published her first novel named <<The stories of the Sahara>>. This book was quickly popular with people at that time. She went back to TaiWan to teach in University in 1981 and then died on Jaunary 4th,1991. 
She has lots of works in her lifetime, all of these are about her life in other country, and still popular today.

Sanmao is one of the most famous writers in China. Most of her works describe her experience of studying in foreign countries. Here is some information about her.

She came out her first work called The stories of the Sahara in 1976. Then she went back to Taiwan and worked as a teacher. Unluckily, she died on January 4, 1991 because of the illness.
  Though she died, many of her works are still popular among the readers.

Sanmao
Sanmow was a modern celebrated writer in China. She loved traveling around the world and her works were always about her journey. The following are Sammao's introduction. 
She was born on March 26th 1943 in Chongqin. At the age of five, She moved to Taiwan with her parents. She went to Spain for further education in 1967. After that, she also studied in other countries, like Germany, America and so on. When she was in the univercity, Jose came along to her life. Sanmao fell in love with Jose quickly and married him in 1973. They decided to live in Sahara desert. Three years later, Sammao published her first work《The story of the Sahara》. Plenty of readers show great interest in the book. In 1981, she came back to Taiwan and became a univercity teacher.

A woman who named San Mao is one of the most famous Chinese writers. She had lots of works and most of them were from the stories of traveling in foreign home town.

In 1967, she fell in love with Jose and married him. They lived in Sahara after wedding. She back to Taiwan to become a teache at a university in 1981 after she published her first work called The stories of the Sahara. On 1991,1.4, San Mao passed away
San Mao's works is still popular among many readers.

I'm sorry to hear that you have trouble getting on with you parents. There are some advices for you to communicate with your parents. I think this advices are practical.
First, you should chat with your parents in you freetime, and try your best to understand them and respect them.

third, you should do some housework. Don't let your parents too tired. Forth, Don't let your parents worried about your study.

A famous writer
Do you know the stories of the Sahra? It was written by Sang Mao, a celebrated writer, in 1976. 
Sang Mao's life is interesting but hard. She born in Chong Qing on March 26th in 1943. When she was 5, she went to Taiwan with her parents. In 1967, She studied in Spain and went to America and German, too. During her trips, she met Jose and married to him, they lived in the Sahra. In 1981, she became a teacher in Taiwan and ten years later she died. 
Sang Mao has so many works about her foreign trips, and they are popular among the readers.

Sanmao is a celebrated women writer. Most of her articles is about touring in foreign countries. The following introduces her shortly. Sanmao was born in Chongqing on March 26th, 1943. When she was young, she moved to Taiwan with her parents. When she was 24 years old, she started to go abroad for further studying. The countries she stayed included Spain, Germany and America. In 1973. Sanmao married Jose and lived together in the Sahara Desert. Although the life was hard, she wrote many warm stories. Then, her first work The stories of the Sahara was publised and soon became popular among Chinese students. However, after her husband's death, Sanmao went back to Taiwan to be a teacher. The popular writer died in January 4th. 1991.

On March the 26th, 1943, San Mao , one of the most famous female writer in China, was born in Chongqin. At the age of five, she moved to Taiwan with her parents. This beautiful and wise woman got married. From then on, she lived in the Sahara with her husband Jose and experienced the culture there. After living there for three years, her first work The stories of the Sahara. came out. For a time, almost everyone in Taiwan was attracted by her amazing stories. In 1981, she returned to Taiwan and started teaching in a college. On January the 24th, she passed away in peace. Such an amicable and amazing woman, was deeply loved by the readers.
